dcterms:creator: H. Jégou
M. Douze
C. Schmid
dcterms:description: The Ukbench dataset contains 10,200 images composed of 2,550 groups. Each image is taken as query in turn, and three groundtruth images with extensive variations are provided. The N-S score is used to count the number of relevant images in the top-4 ranked images.
dcterms:title: Ukbench

dcterms:creator: H. Jégou
M. Douze
C. Schmid
dcterms:description: The Holidays dataset is released with 1,491 personal holiday pictures. There are 500 queries in total. The Mean Average Precision (mAP) is used to evaluate search accuracy.
dcterms:title: Holidays

dcterms:creator: D. Gray
S. Brennan
H. Tao
dcterms:description: The VIPeR dataset is composed of 632 persons, each having two images captured from two cameras. Personsin this dataset undergo extensive variances in viewpoint, pose, illumination, etc, and are normalized to 128×48 pixels.
dcterms:title: VIPeR

dcterms:creator: B. T. Mark J. Huiskes
M. S. Lew
dcterms:description: The Flickr1M dataset contains only the SIFT descriptors, which is compatible with the SIFT descriptors used in the test datasets.
dcterms:title: Flickr1M

dcterms:creator: H. Jégou
M. Douze
C. Schmid
dcterms:description: The Flickr343Places dataset contains high-resolution images that vary from scenes to objects and can be viewed as a good sampling of natural images.
dcterms:title: Flickr343Places
